org.apache.accumulo.tserver.tablet

Class Tablet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.tserver.tablet.Tablet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TabletCommitter

    public class Tablet
extends java.lang.Object
implements TabletCommitter
    Provide access to a single row range in a living TabletServer.
Shall be called with TabletServer, MinorCompactor, Compactor, KeyExtent, TabletData, TabletTime, TableConfiguration, ConfigurationObserver.
